ComicInfo.Title: Ansar III; Moderate Pressure Part 1; A Palestinian Joke; The Tough and the Dead; Moderate Pressure Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ansar III: Sacco relates the representative stories of three alumni of the Ansar III prison.
Moderate Pressure Part 1: Sacco talks to a few people who experienced torture under custody of the Shin Bet.
A Palestinian Joke: What happens when a CIA agent, KGB agent and a Shin Bet agent walk along a forest and see a rabbit?
The Tough and the Dead: A Palestinian woman talks about the torture she experienced while being held by the Shin Bet. In addition, Sacco attends the funeral procession of Mustafa Akkawi, who died after two weeks of Israeli interrogation.
Moderate Pressure Part 2: Sacco interviews a man who experienced days of being bound with sleep deprivation.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:15:10. [Issue ID 383051]
